t: Out of Warranty Repair Service for Kindle, Fire TV, and Alexa Devices - Amazon Customer Service
s: Communications Test Design, Inc. (CTDI) is Amazon's authorized service provider for out of warranty repairs for Kindle, Fire TV, and Alexa devices.

t: Warranty Repairs - Amazon Customer Service
s: Some products sold directly by Amazon and Amazon Resale that are covered under a manufacturer's warranty may be eligible for repair by a third-party repair service provider authorized by select manufacturers to repair their products.

t: Limited Warranty for Amazon Private Brands - Amazon Customer Service
s: Find more solutions · This limited warranty is provided by the entity listed in the table below ("Amazon", "we", "us") to you as the original purchaser of the products listed below (the "Product"). We warrant each Product against defects in materials and workmanship under ordinary use.

t: Amazon Renewed: Shop Refurbished, Pre-Owned and Open-Box Products
s: Products on Amazon Renewed have been inspected and tested by qualified suppliers to work and look like new, and come with a minimum 90-day supplier-backed warranty. Shop for smartphones, computers, laptops, tablets, home and kitchen appliances, game consoles, office products, and more.

t: Get Product Support - Amazon Customer Service
s: If you need help with using your product or if it doesn't work correctly, Amazon provides free Product Support. Among these options are calls, chat, manufacturer contact details, and text or video troubleshooting guides.

t: VFAUOSIT Brand Kitchen Faucets Recalled Due to Dangerous Lead Exposure for Young Children; Sold on Amazon.com by Whisper08 | CPSC.gov
s: Consumers should immediately stop using these faucets and contact Whisper08 about disposal and a refund.
